messages.title: Richard Burt’s contract with You
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for our community. I have an office in the constituency open at least 5 days a week. I hold regular surgeries in easily accessible places. I will make sure your voice is heard - locally and at Westminster. I will be a strong voice for fairness.

messages.title: It’s a question of honesty
messages.content: The Conservatives say about their candidate... 'Harriett has never been a banker.' But the truth is... 'Harriett was until recently a managing director at JP Morgan, the investment bank...before she decided to run for Parliament.'

messages.title: Who will deliver for you as our new MP?
messages.content: It’s a two horse race! Richard Burt has been a real champion for local people: Fighting to keep and improve our NHS services. Leading the campaign against Tory plans to cut housing and devolve power more to towns and villages. Helping flood victims and making a strong case for extra flood money and flood protection. Labour can’t win in West Worcestershire

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will introduce a Bill to help improve research and care for Dementia sufferers. Fight to preserve vital public services and the NHS.
Support 'green' economic growth to create jobs and protect the environment.
Meet regularly with local service providers like the police, health services and residents' groups.

quotes.text: Richard Burt has been a real champion for local people.

images.caption: Nick Clegg offers Britain real change
